snippet: The company said the new airline would begin operations in 2015, but provided few details about which destinations it might serve.
lead_paragraph: The company said the new airline would begin operations in 2015, but provided few details about which destinations it might serve.

headline.main: Lufthansa to Start Low-Cost, Long-Distance Airline
headline.print_headline: Lufthansa to Start Low-Cost, Long-Distance Airline
